subs.text: @MisfitTorah Here’s something that could be done from NYC: Take advantage of remote learning technology to enable observation and mentoring of rookie teachers by pedagogical professionals.

subs.text: @MisfitTorah The year I taught high school, I got very little training and very little observation.
subs.rawText: @MisfitTorah The year I taught high school, I got very little training and very little observation.

subs.text: @MisfitTorah Arguably, there weren’t enough administrators — or certainly not enough administration time devoted to helping me succeed.
